definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: The cold overall tone in the image is brilliantly accompanied by the golden in the grass and on the towers.
sentences.chinese: 画中整体的冷色调连同金黄的草与塔尖，堪称完美。

sentences.english: Butter lamps, together with the numerous pre-Buddhist worship.
sentences.chinese: 连同无数的酥油灯供奉佛前。

sentences.english: Chongzhen suicided together with a eunuch Wang Chengen.
sentences.chinese: 崇自杀连同一个太监王成恩。

sentences.english: It is a well written gatha with an excellent explanation.
sentences.chinese: 此篇连同解说都写得极出色。

sentences.english: Please return the completed form to your school.
sentences.chinese: 请连同家长回条交回学校。

sentences.english: Please complete the enclosed form and return it with the appropriate fee. Thanks again for your business.
sentences.chinese: 烦表填妥随附表格，连同广告费用一并寄回。

sentences.english: Occasionally the finger-shaped structure of the capsula with the cortex entered the medulla.
sentences.chinese: 有时部分被膜连同皮质一起呈指状伸入髓质内。

sentences.english: Please complete the enclosed form. and return it with the appropriate fee.
sentences.chinese: 烦表填妥随附表格，连同广告费用一并寄回。

sentences.english: Sometimes a choli would be worn with this.
sentences.chinese: 有时候会连同短袖外套一起穿上。

sentences.english: You will find Enclosed an outline of my education and business training and copies of two letters of recommendation.
sentences.chinese: 有关本人学历，业务培训的概要连同两封信一同呈上。

sentences.english: Please post the original order form with a crossed cheque to the council.
sentences.chinese: 请再将已传真之表格正本连同划线支票邮寄至本协会。

sentences.english: Please fill this application form out and return it to us with the necessary documents by Friday.
sentences.chinese: 请填妥这张申请表，并连同所需文件于星期五前交来。

sentences.english: Pick up your Host Organizing Committee gift bag with the voucher in your registration packet.
sentences.chinese: 领取你的地主筹备委员会礼品袋连同你注册袋之收据。

sentences.english: Then he sent it to his mother with a birthday card.
sentences.chinese: 然后，他把一张生日贺卡连同那只鸟寄给了他妈。

sentences.english: Take the letters along with the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 把信连同报纸一起带去。

sentences.english: If you cannot attend, you may fill out the application form and send it back to us with a cheque.
sentences.chinese: 如未能拨冗出席，可填妥表格连同支票寄回。

definition: to lump together/to treat along with all the others
variant of 一併|一并, to lump together/to treat along with all the others
to be related/to entail/to involve/joint (liability etc)
to scatter/to break sth up/to beat (an egg)
to enumerate in detail/to explain clearly
